question: What is the main purpose of this lesson?
options: To create new designs from scratch
To make changes without starting from the beginning
answer: To make changes without starting from the beginning

question: What happens when you make changes to a linked Arduino component?
options: The changes automatically appear in the main assembly
The changes require manual updates to take effect
answer: The changes require manual updates to take effect

question: What warning appears when the Arduino file is updated?
options: Most recent version is not up to date
answer: Most recent version is not up to date

options: Work forwards in time, backwards in sequence
Work backwards in time, forwards in sequence
answer: Work backwards in time, forwards in sequence
